snippet: SACK--Bob. Bob Sack, of Manhasset, NY on April 28, 2016. Attorney and founding partner of Salenger, Sack, Kimmel & Bavaro, LLP. Widely recognized and admired for his character, intellect, formidable negotiation skills, lifelong friendships and caring nature. Honored with Lifetime Achievement Award by New York City Trial Lawyers Association. Professional distinctions include Martindale- Hubbell, Best Lawyers in America, New York Super Lawyers. Member, Hunter College Athletic Hall of Fame, Basketball. Loving husband of 45 years to Marlene. Loving father to John, Jen and son-in-law Evan. Adored by grandchildren Sam, Jack, Georgia and Levi. Funeral services 11am Sunday, May 1, Gutterman's Funeral Home, 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, NY 11797 (516) 921-5757. 1/3
